tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have been visiting Dr.Kavitha for a quite sometime now for diabetic consultantation. With her treatment and advise, the sugar levels are well under control. When we first came to know about our diabetic conditions, we were bit worried and had a very negative mind set. But after meeting Dr.Kavitha, in the first meeting itself, the confidence that she gave us helped us a lot to control the sugar levels. The way she treated us, medicine and advice she gave helped us a lot. We really are thankful to her for being so friendly and helpful to fight against diabetes and lead a normal life

tags: None
review: Visited to the hospital she has good communication and polite, the explanation that she gave was good. Reviews of the doctor were good, I visited her for high fever. I would recommend this doctor, but the only thing to improve is the availability of medicines in the hospital which the doctor suggested to me was not available in the hospital. The Doctor''''s behavior was good, she was listening to my problem and suggestions that she gave were helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly doctor. Visited for blood pressure and other problems. If you have any general health related problems, you can consult her without any second thought. I am very much satisfied with her treatment. She took enough time to explain health issues and treatment in detail. We can contact her in whatsapp also and we can get immediate response from doctor.

tags: None
review: ********* *** ***** I visited for my mother's diabetic check up and was satisfied with the doctor treatment. I would like to recommend this doctor to others. Doctor behaviour was good and listened to our problem patiently. There was a bit of waiting time to consult the doctor and everything was fine in the hospital. I would like to give a rating of 4/5 to the hospital.

tags: None
review: She approached the case very nicely. She heard about the issue very well and suggested good medicines. Within a few days, I was cured and I had a cough and a cold. I would like to recommend this doctor to others and everything was good in the hospital but when I went to the pharmacy in hospital there was more queue so we went out and brought the medicines. I would like to give a rating to the hospital 7/10. Satisfied with doctor treatment and she was very helpful.

tags: None
review: Met the doctor. It was good to meet her, the problem that I had I shared with her and she gave me a good explanation about this. I was having muscle cramps so I visited her to show, I would like to recommend the doctor to family and friends. Nothing as such wants to improve or make better with the doctor. Behaviour wise she was good, am satisfied with the doctor and her treatment.
